actions.text: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Costa.

description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to authorize the Army Corps to accept contributed funds from the owners of non-federal Section 7 reservoirs for the purpose of reviewing/revising operational documents, including flood control manuals and rule curves.
purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to authorize the Army Corps to accept contributed funds from the owners of non-federal Section 7 reservoirs for the purpose of reviewing/revising operational documents, including flood control manuals and rule curves.
